data.name: RPG Sounds - On Ancient Sands - Sound Pack
data.detailed_description:
On Ancient Sands is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • Chimes Mantra
  • Sand Temple
  • Desert Wyrm

SFX
  • Temple Collapse Small (4)
  • Temple Collapse Medium (4)
  • Temple Collapse Big (4)
  • Temple Collapse Huge (4)
  • Frightening Screech
  • Mine Lever
  • Desert Wyrm Attack (4)
  • Desert Quicksand (4)
  • Psychic Attack

data.short_description: On Ancient Sands is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
